requests.description: requests defines the module safe queries to execute.

MsgModuleQuerySafe.title: Msg Module Query Safe
MsgModuleQuerySafe.description: MsgModuleQuerySafe defines the payload for Msg/ModuleQuerySafe

path.description: path defines the path of the query request as defined by ADR-021. https://github.com/cosmos/cosmos-sdk/blob/main/docs/architecture/adr-021-protobuf-query-encoding.md#custom-query-registration-and-routing

data.description: data defines the payload of the query request as defined by ADR-021. https://github.com/cosmos/cosmos-sdk/blob/main/docs/architecture/adr-021-protobuf-query-encoding.md#custom-query-registration-and-routing

ibc.applications.interchain_accounts.hos.title: Query Request
ibc.applications.interchain_accounts.hos.description: QueryRequest defines the parameters for a particular query request by an interchain account.
